input.sentences: there was a huge parade today .
everyone was out on the street .
some people were dancing in the streets .
they were all heading to the cathedral .
output.sentences: There was a huge parade in the street.
I was very noisy and energetic in the street.
Many people had bright and colorful costumes on.
We watched on as people marched down the street.
Following all the people marching, was a long line of cars.
